name: NSW AIR FLIGHT TRAINING PTY LTD
about: NSW Air Flight Training Pty Ltd is the premier flight training organisation on the NSW South Coast, operating from Shellharbour Regional Airport. We offer professional flight training for those aspiring to careers as Commercial and Airline Pilots, as well as for Private Pilots seeking recreational aviation. Our highly experienced instructors provide comprehensive flight and ground training for Private Pilot Licences (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licences (CPL). We also offer scenic flights, aerobatic flights on the "Blue Thunder" Nanchang CJ6-A, and corporate or private charter services. With a focus on safety and excellence, NSW Air Flight Training caters to all ages and skill levels, ensuring a top-notch educational and vocational experience in aviation. Contact us to embark on your flying journey today.
services:
["Trial Instructional Flight
Recreational Pilots License
Private Pilots License
Commercial Pilots License
CSU and Retractable
Initial Multi-Engine Endorsement
Multi-Engine Aeroplane Instrument Rating (MEAIR)
Night VFR Rating (NVFR)"]
